original_text:
Medicine Progress
**INSTITUTION
Patient :
**NAME[AAA , BBB]
MRN - **ID-NUM - MPACCOMMMRN
Age :
**AGE[in 50s] years
Sex :
Female
DOB :
**DATE[Jun 29 1953]
Author :
**NAME[XXX  , WWW M]
Health Status
Summary of Hospitalization :
This **AGE[in 50s] year old AA female with h/o SCA admitted to MICU **DATE[Apr 8 07] with c/o cough + green sputum , abd pain , N/V
Past Medical History :
SCA
Hepatitis C
ICH **DATE[Mar 2004]
Chronic Pain
Subjective / Events Overnight :
RN washing Pt at this time ; RN states Pt with frequent loose BM s , incontinent of stool .
Vital signs
BP : systolic 151 , diastolic 76 .
Pulse :
118 beats per min .
Resp :
24 breaths / min .
Physical Exam
General Appearance :
Middle aged AA female in NAD .
Cardiovascular :
S1 , S2 , M .
IRRR .
Respiratory :
Scattered rhonchi / wheeze .
Gastrointestinal :
+**PLACE , ND .
Musculoskeletal :
+ 2 B LE edema ankle to thigh .
Skin :
Warm and dry .
Neurological :
Awake , alert , but feels " confused ."
Cannot maintain hold on pen with B UE .
Wiggles B LE toes .
Head leans to R ; has difficulty holding head upright .
Impression and Plan
Plan
Heme - h/o SCA .
Admitted in crisis .
On Aranesp .
Attending adjusted analgesia - Morphine sulfate 4 mg IV every 2 hrs prn .
RN reports good pain control .
Pulmonary - h/o asthma - Duonebs prn ; PNA - Cefepime D/c 'd - completed full course .
IV hydrocortisone .
HEENT - Group A Strep Throat - Amoxil Day #5 .
Otalgia / inc. hearing loss - ENT c/s - Floxin Otic .
Cards - A fib - Cardizem ( when BP parameters allow ) .
May need to inc .
Cardizem .
FEN - IVF s -D5W and 2 amp bicarb at 30 cc / h .
**DATE[Mar] appetite .
Diuretics on hold .
GI - Hepatic encephalopathy - Lactulose .
Monitoring ammonia level .
Frequent loose BM s .
Rectal tube .
Renal - **INITIALS - IVF s; diuretics on hold .
Renal c/s - Renal US , urine lytes , urine urea , U/A/UCS .
Neuro - Diffuse weakness of ext - CTH ordered .
Disposition - Most likely will need d/c to SNF when stable .
Professional Services
Credentials and Title of Author **NAME[VVV] Signing this Document : PA-C

( on **DATE[Apr 18 2007] 11:03 )

VERIFY by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
